## ginkgo-cli note edit

Edit an existing note

```
ginkgo-cli note edit <id> [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --force      on conflict, reopen against latest for another edit
  -h, --help       help for edit
      --keep-tmp   keep temporary editor file after save
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string      path to config file (yaml|toml)
  -n, --namespace string   override namespace for this command
```
